ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Instrument vs. melee attacks
ygData.msgSnippet: I am getting excited about trying the new chants. ... From:  ... Hmmm, one chant is missing here?  I am guessing you say both CoFl and CoFr
ygData.messageBody:
I am getting excited about trying the new chants.

----- Original Message -----
From: <kim@...>

> Chants with a drum at L50:
>
> FCC = ~31 damage/6 sec
> CoF = 48 damage/6 sec

> total = 127 damage/6 sec = 21.2 damage/sec
> total w/ MM drum = 148 damage/6 sec = 24.7 damage/sec
> total w/ Selo's drum = 169 damage/6 sec = 28.2 damage/sec

Hmmm, one chant is missing here? I am guessing you say both CoFl and CoFr
doing 48 dmg?

I just did a quick test Chant of Frost with Mistmoore Drum: 108 total dmg on
myself (presuming the 2/3's nerf for PvP - that means I can do 54 dmg per
round).

Remember, after you equip your drum (and get the crap graphic), you can
equip you range wep and that will be the current graphic visible to the
outside world. Heh, I do it with my runed bone fork and it looks like I am
playing my spear ;p - will be good to do when chanting mobs. Time to kite
some Ice Giants???

Sylly
